QuestData.Title: Dragonmaw Race: Trope the Filth-Belcher
QuestData.Description: Dragonmaw treat you right, $n. Even a worn out cursed being like me is given a chance. Now if you want to prove your worth to the Skybreakers, you will have to defeat me.$B$BI'm going to shake you off my tail like a bad case of fleas...$B$BWe'll lift off when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Trope the Filth-Belcher while attempting to stay on your flying mount. Should you defeat Trope the Filth-Belcher, report your victory to Ja'y Nosliw at the Dragonmaw Base Camp in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ja'y Nosliw at Netherwing Ledge in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.CompletionText: Trope defeated some of my best riders. Don't let the filthiness fool you.
QuestData.RewardText: Interesting... Your next match will undoubtedly prove much more difficult. Corlok is no slouch.
